exam.question: The tomato juice left brown _______ on the front of my jacket.

answer.explain: 句意： 番茄汁在我夹克的前襟上留下了褐色的斑迹。 point： 点； track： 行踪； 小道； trace： 踪迹， 足迹， 痕迹。

sentences.sContent: a nice quiet spot on the beach
sentences.sCn: 海滩上一个安静的好地方

sentences.sContent: I chose a spot well away from the road.
sentences.sCn: 我选了一个远离马路的地点。

sentences.sContent: ...And you may even spot the highway or railroad from this point...
...you will get a spot on your tongue if you tell a lie...
...chains big enough to fall under the rule will face penalties about 2000 dollars for not showing calorie information in a prominent spot on their menus preferably next to the price...
...which makes it easy to spot bad drivers...
...Attracting numbers of birds continually to the same spot can be harmful to them...
